mutants.code:
import re

def extract_prices(html_string):
    """
    Extracts prices from an HTML string.

    Args:
        html_string (str): The input HTML string.

    Returns:
        list: A list of extracted prices.
    """
    div_tags = re.findall('', html_string, re.DOTALL)
    div_texts = [re.sub('<.*?>', '', div_tag) for div_tag in div_tags]
    price_pattern = '(?:[£€$]\\s?)?(\\d+(?:[,.]\\d{3})*(?:[,.]\\d{1,2})?)\\s?(?:GBP|USD|EUR)?'
    prices = [price for div_text in div_texts for price in re.findall(price_pattern, div_text)]
    return prices

mutants.original_line: div_texts = [re.sub(r"<.*?>", "", div_tag) for div_tag in div_tags]

mutants.code: import re def extract_prices(html_string): """ Extracts prices from an HTML string. Args: html_string (str): The input HTML string. Returns: list: A list of extracted prices. """ div_tags = re.findall('', html_string, re.DOTALL) div_texts = [re.sub('<.*?>', 'MUTATED', div_tag) for div_tag in div_tags] price_pattern = '(?:[£€$]\\s?)?(\\d+(?:[,.]\\d{3})*(?:[,.]\\d{1,2})?)\\s?(?:GBP|USD|EUR)?' prices = [price for div_text in div_texts for price in re.findall(price_pattern, div_text)] return prices
